title: Party At The World's End
description: Fallen Party At The World’s End is a mad ride past the event horizon of sanity with a group of young, escaped mental patients that come to realize—or believe—that they are demigods. They form Babylon, a band that captures the spirit of the age as sex, drugs, and chaos reign in the final years of the American Empire.This is the beginning of a modern mythology that spills off the the ticket to the Party At The World's End is inside, if you dare to search for it. It starts right here, but it won't end here...
author: James Curcio
